title.rendered: Syncwire Lightning iPhone Charger Cable – 1M [Apple MFi Certified] Premium Nylon Braided Apple Charger Lead USB Fast…

content.rendered:
(*8*)

ABOUT SYNCWIRE

A individuals primarily based firm based in 2015 devoted to the event of outstanding high quality merchandise starting from cell phone equipment to wearable gadgets.

We design merchandise that stand out available in the market yielding distinctive magnificence and serve lengthy lasting worth.

Syncwire Fansful Series

Nylon Lightning Cable [3.3 ft, 1M]

Your Great Choice

Apple MFi UL-FCC-CE licensed cable designed with multi shield security system and multilayer coatings, this iPhone charger cable is endowed with surge safety，excellent insulation and shielding, which make charging and syncing simpler and safer.

Ideal for residence, workplace, automobile, or nightstand, Syncwire iPhone charger cable supplies on a regular basis comfort and flexibility.

  • Apple MFi Certification
  • Laser-welded Connectors
  • Revolutionary Durability
  • Double-Braided Nylon Jacket
  • Fast Charge and Data Transfer

Read more

Apple MFi-Certified

Apple MFi certification ensures full cost and sync compatibility along with your Apple gadgets and latest iOS system.

Laser-welded Connector

Seamless laser-welded connectors permit for extra exact outcomes than typical welding executed by different warmth supply. The lightning finish may be utilized 15kg vertically with out damaged.

Revolutionary Durability

Bulletproof and sturdy nylon fiber material supplies safety, energy and adaptability. It has been examined to face up to a minimum of 12,000 cycles of 90 diploma bend, which may be 12x sturdy than authentic system cables.

High Speed Charging & Sync

Ensure quick charging velocity as much as 2.4A and steady information switch. The cable is made of top of the range tinned copper and energy wire, and lined with particular insulation materials to cut back the danger of quick circuit.

*We extremely advocate that the Lightning Connector needs to be cleaned and disinfected by 75%-95% alcohol in each two weeks to keep away from poor contact attributable to dust, which is to supply a greater charging expertise.

(*7*)

Compatible with

  • iPhone 12 / 12 Mini / 12 Pro / 12 Pro Max / SE(2020)
  • iPhone 11 / 11 Pro / 11 Pro Max / XS Max / XR / XS / X
  • iPhone 8 / 8 Plus / 7 / 7 Plus
  • iPhone 6s / 6s Plus / 6 / 6 Plus / SE 5s / 5c / 5
  • iPad Air/Air 2, iPad mini /mini 2 /mini 3 /mini 4
  • iPad (fifth / sixth era)
  • iPad Pro 12.9-inch (1st / 2nd Generation)
  • iPad Pro 10.5-inch / iPad Pro 9.7-inch
  • iPod contact fifth / sixth / seventh Generation,
  • iPod nano seventh Generation

Read more

(*6*)

Read more

【Super Protection】Apple MFi UL FC CE licensed cable, designed with multi-safety safety system and multi-layer circumstances, this iPhone charging cable is provided with surge safety, distinctive insulation, and shielding, permitting simpler and safer charging and syncing.
Apple MFi licensed: with Apple’s authentic C48 interface and good chip, the Syncwire fan collection lightning cable ensures charging with 100% excessive velocity and compatibility for synchronisation with iPhone 11 / 11 Pro / 11 Pro Max / XS / XR / 8 / 8 Plus / 7 / 7 Plus / 6s / 6s Plus / 6s Plus / 6s Plus / 6s Plus / 6 Plus / SE / 5S / 5C / 5, iPad Pro, iPad, iPod, Mac and AirPods fashions which have an 8-pin Lightning connector.
【Charge & Sync with Extremely High Speed】Pure copper cables guarantee sooner and extra dependable charging, with a velocity of as much as 2.4A, 20% sooner than different iPhone cables. A double layer aluminium foil protects the steadiness of your information switch and secures your Apple gadgets completely.
Revolutionary resilience: made with extraordinarily resilient, bullet-proof fibres and extremely elastic TPE, coated with excessive-high quality, double-braided nylon, the cable can face up to as much as 12000 faces kinking and a tensile load of as much as 50 kg, regardless of the confirmed 12 instances greater resistance in comparison with the unique iPhone charging cable. With a load of as much as 15 kg, you possibly can load the lightning finish with out damaging it.
What you count on: The Syncwire fan collection nylon braided lightning cable, our fear-free 36-month guarantee and naturally our customer support
